Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Drug or Chemical by Structure/Inorganic Chemical/Mineral/Dietary Mineral/Dietary Iodine
Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Drug or Chemical by Structure/Inorganic Chemical/Element/Trace Element/Iodine
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A nonmetallic element of the halogen group that is represented by the atomic symbol I, atomic number 53, and atomic weight of 126.90. It is a nutritionally essential element, especially important in thyroid hormone synthesis. In solution, it has anti-infective properties and is used topically.
An element with atomic symbol I, atomic number 53, and atomic weight of 126.90.
